CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 29, 1958, pg. B26, reads: "This is the Way! - Teen-age dancers Hope Tucker and Willa Fountaine are shown teaching routines to younger dancers in their capacities as dance instructors at Howe Studios, East Liberty. Left to right: Randy Pitts, Miss Tucker, Renee Pitts, Elizabeth Hunt, Marcia Griffin and Miss Fountaine. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dance teachers Hope Tucker and Willa Fountaine instructing students Randy Pitts, Renee Pitts, Elizabeth Hunt, and Marcia Griffin at barre in Howe Studios, East Liberty
